patterns: what departments or programs have the best reputations?
responses: Both the department of technology and medical sciences have the best reputation

yes we have excellent and well educated staff

patterns: how much reading or writing is required in your courses?
responses: Apart from college, two to three hours of  self reading should be enough

patterns: are your classes lecture-based or discussion-based?
responses: Classes are both lecture-based and discussion-based

patterns: How often are collaborative work or group presentations required?
responses: In every semester we have collaborative work and group projects

patterns: How satisfied are you with academic advising?
responses: I am very satisfied with academic advising
We have class strength of 80 students

patterns: Do students use any on-campus tutoring programs or writing centers?
responses: We have government funded IELTS classes for interested students

patterns: Are professors available for research with students?
responses: Yes professors are available for research with students

patterns: Does your major require an independent study or personal projects?
responses: It is not a compulsory requirement but is recommended for building a good profile

patterns: Is it popular to study abroad?
responses: Yes it seems to be the latest trend

patterns: What courses are offered by your universtiy?
How many courses are there in your university?
responses: CHARUSAT offers 72 programs from UG to PhD under the 9 Institutes and 6 Faculties. They are in the allied disciplines of Technology & Engineering, Pharmacy, Computer Applications, Management Studies, Applied Sciences, Nursing, Physiotherapy, and Paramedical Sciences.

patterns: What's it like to be a first-year student here?
responses: Fresher are treated really well
First year students are well looked after
A typical day includes lectures and self learning time along with sports and other activities in the evening

patterns: How much time do students spend studying per week?
responses: Students have workdays from Monday to Friday
Monday to Friday from 9:10 a.m. to 4:20 p.m.

patterns: What do you do when you're not in class?
responses: You can use any special labs like mac lab or SOPHOS lab. You can also go to the library

patterns: What is the social scene like?
responses: People here are friendly and approachable

patterns: What do you do on the weekends?
responses: On the weekends we catch a movie, play snooker and have fun
The food here is great
We have 5 canteens and everything from gujarati thali to fruits and ice creams
Almost 45% of students live on-campus and other students travel daily from Ahmedabad, Vadodara and Anand
Yes we have girls hostel with good accommodation in campus and there are multiple boys hostel outside the campus area

patterns: Which clubs and student organizations are popular?
responses: We have coding club, drama club, Cyber security club among others
The dorms are in good condition with three students in a room

patterns: What's your favorite place on campus?
Where do you like to study?
What are the facilities like (science labs, libraries, theatres, gyms, etc.)?
responses: We have a big library along with indoor games room and a gym. We also have many Super Speciality labs like COE, IOT, AR/VR Apple labs.etc
We have sufficient computer labs in our college

patterns: How is the WiFi on campus?
responses: We have good internet connectivity

patterns: Is it easy to get around campus?
responses: Its very easy to get around campus
Yes sports like football, volleyball and cricket are popular here

patterns: How would you describe your fellow students?
responses: All students here are good natured and friendly

patterns: What makes the student body unique?
responses: The student body here is elected by voting and not selected by any one person
Yes we have international students from Africa and Nepal

we have to apply for internships

patterns: Are there opportunities to build leadership skills on campus?
responses: Yes we have many competitions which help you to hone your leadership skills

patterns: What options exist for service learning in the community?
responses: We have peer learning sessions where fellow classmates give lecture on area of their expertise

patterns: Do employers recruit students on campus?
responses: Yes we have on campus placements

patterns: How easy is it to find summer jobs and other kinds of work through your college?
responses: It is fairly easy to get summer internships from our college
